comments.raw_text:
While investigating suite bug 631493 it became obvious that $topsrcdir can become blank (unset) in configure, at least in a mac universal build [From comm-central].

This bug is for further investigation/fixing the issue, as it can lead to other problems like what I just fixed there.

quoting from that bug (c#4):
=========
generated autoconf.mk on both i386 and x86_64 had no FIREFOX_VERSION.

a patch of configure to verify what FIREFOX_VERSION should be, right after the
cat verified it was blank, as well as that $topsrcdir was blank. Which is
itself worrysome [will file a followup on that specific issue]
=========
